title: The Abbot
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: "The Regent was out on foot and all his company, except the Laird ofGrange, Alexander Hume of Manderston, and some borderers to the numberof two hundred.

title: Life and Correspondence of David Hume, Volume I (of 2)
author: Burton, John Hill
snippet: This reason will perhaps explain why, in none of the histories of thattime, even the more particular, there is any mention made of ourancestors; while we meet with Wedderburn, Aiton, Manderston,Cowdenknows, Sprot, and other cadets of Home.
